name: Yourls
natural_language_description: 这是 Yourls 节点。主要用于: Consume Yourls API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: url

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: shorten
available_options: Stats (值: stats) - Get stats about one short URL

url.name: url
url.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL | 作用: The URL to shorten | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: title (值: None) - Title for custom short URLs

shortUrl.name: shortUrl
shortUrl.description: The short URL for which to get stats
shortUrl.natural_language_description: 参数名: Short URL | 作用: The short URL for which to get stats | (必填项)
